LoginLanding.Text: Please wait. You will be redirected to a destination soon...

JoinMailingList.Title: Stay informed!
JoinMailingList.Text:
Provide your email below and we'll keep you up-to-date on developments.
You can unsubscribe at any time.

Email.Error: Please enter a valid Email Address

ConfirmEmail.Error: Please enter a valid Email Address

JoinMailingList.MatchEmailsError: Please ensure that both email fields are filled in and that the addresses match.
JoinMailingList.LoadingError: We're sorry, but an error has occurred.

SessionWillExpire.Title: Your session will time-out soon
SessionWillExpire.Text: To protect your privacy, the system is going to log you out because you have been away for a while. Click “Continue” to stay logged in. Click “Sign Out” if you are done for now.

Warning.Title: Download Chrome or Safari to Continue
Warning.Text1: This project is designed for use with the internet's safest and most popular browsers -- Chrome and Safari.
Warning.Text2: It looks like you are using Internet Explorer. You will need to use another browser in order to join the project. We suggest you use Chrome or Safari to ensure that your experience with the website is smooth and secure.

Text3.Pt1: Click the following links to download
Text3.Pt3: Chrome and Safari are always free.

StayInformed.Title: Stay Informed!
StayInformed.Text: Thank you for joining the email list. We'll send you updates and keep you informed. You can unsubscribe at any time. If you have any questions about your status in the project, please email

Password.Title: Please enter the password
Password.OtherError: We're sorry, but an error has occurred.

InternationalPatients.Title: Information for International Patients

ThankYou.TextPt1: Thank you for your interest in joining the Metastatic Prostate Cancer Project. Currently, the Metastatic Prostate Cancer Project is open to patients in the United States or Canada. From the Country field on your survey, it appears that you do not live in the United States or Canada. If you do live or are treated in the United States or Canada, please reach out to us at

InternationalPatients.Understand: We understand that the experiences of every patient matters, and eventually want to extend these studies internationally. Understanding where people are registering from may enable us to better understand what parts of the world might be most interested in participating in the future of Count Me In projects.

ErrorPage.Title: We've encountered an error
ErrorPage.Header: We're sorry, but an error has occurred.

DefaultText.TextPt1: Please wait a moment and retry. If the trouble persists, please email us at

ErrorCodes.PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_EXPIRED: Your password reset link has expired.

Text.Pt1: You were away for a while, so we logged you out as a security precaution.
Text.Pt2: Please log in again to return to the last page you were on.

SDK.ValidateError: Please correct any errors in the form.
SDK.CommunicationError: There was a problem saving your data. Please check the form and your answers before submitting.
SDK.SaveError: We're sorry but an error occurred.

Dashboard.Title: My Dashboard
Dashboard.Text: The dashboard below describes each Metastatic Prostate Cancer Project form and its status.
